thread.title: BRIEF-Kingboard Chemical And Kingboard Laminates Expect An Increase In Underlying Net Profit For 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kingboard Chemical And Kingboard Laminates Expect An Increase In Underlying Net Profit For 2017
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Kingboard Chemical Holdings Ltd :
* FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017 KBC GROUP IS EXPECTING TO RECORD AN INCREASE IN UNDERLYING NET PROFIT OF OVER 60%
* KBL GROUP IS EXPECTING TO RECORD AN INCREASE IN UNDERLYING NET PROFIT OF OVER 90% FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* ‍EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO GROWTH IN UNIT SELLING PRICE OF PRODUCTS OF VARIOUS DIVISIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
